attributes.title: Not my cup of tea.
attributes.review: Unfortunately this app was not for me! You have to sign away your phone number before you even enter the app! What if he had another scandal where he was suppressing minorities? I can’t listen to calls and text trying to defend that. Maybe I’ll consider re downloading the app once he’s a good human being with MORALS and knowledge on BASIC HUMAN RIGHTS.

attributes.title: doesn’t make sense✨🧚🏾‍♀️
attributes.review: hol up i’m confused, how is his campaign “keep america great” when black lives are at risk due to systemic racism and police brutality that was never dismantled after the civil rights era, immigrants are being put in literal cages and raped, native americans are being kidnapped and still having their sacred grounds ruined, lgbt+ people still don’t have the rights to adopt kids and aren’t being respected, and women don’t have the rights to their own bodies. it almost seems like this rich, white man is trying to keep the america that has only benefited his group of ppl since the beginning of america🤔

attributes.title: OMG SO BAD 🤮🤮🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever. It asked for my cellphone information the second I opened it and there’s a photo of this orange man as you open it, i cried it was so horrific. I would never ever ever recommend this to someone else because I actually need eye surgery because my eyes hurt so bad from looking at the orange president, dont waste your time.#SettleForBiden2020 #TrumpForJail2020

attributes.title: Real review
attributes.review: Absolutely appalling I downloaded the app hoping to support this bunker boy and soon realized he has no more intelligence, looks, or even morals than a week old moldy Cheeto covered in orange buffalo hot sauce. The pure stream of fascism and prejudice comments pouring out by the gallon from this creatures mouth when ever it is slightly opened is to appalling. I 10/10 DO NOT recommend this app.

attributes.title: This app is stealing money
attributes.review: as soon as I downloaded the app it asked for my credit card number and social security so naturally I have it to show support for my favorite president of all times but then I noticed the millions of dollars being billed on my account also if you’ve read this far #freebarron2020

attributes.title: bigly hugely terrible
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep up with my #1 buddy don-don during his re-election campaign (even 8 yrs doesn’t feel like enough 😔) and was horrified by what i found. side effects of this app include: homosexual thoughts/tendencies, respecting women & BIPOC, and being a decent human being. would rate it zero stars if possible. do not recommend.

attributes.title: Stop
attributes.review: Just stop bunker boy. You’re dumb and we all know it. You don’t need to release a piece of $¿!+ app to collect our phone numbers so that you can text us everyday to remind us how dumb you are. We have Twitter. That’s all we really need to see the lack of brain cells that are functioning within that orange of head you glued a wig to.

attributes.title: I’m so scared
attributes.review: I love president Trump and I was so excited to support him but when I opened the app I was greeted with really freaky long nailed people. Then it kept asking for my credit card information. When I went to leave the app it tried to use my thumb print for a purchase. This is a scam and not for real Trump supporters, please do not download!!

attributes.title: my shoes hate this app
attributes.review: so i was walking my dog down the street and i saw someone posting about this and i wanted to see if all the negatives things people were saying were true. so i downloaded it and to my surprise it was only pictures of boots on dinner plates (prolly for all those boot lickers like me 😎) !! so i kept scrolling and suddenly, the shoes on my feet started running !! so once they stopped running, i was right infront of a trash can, my shoes kept going back and forth causing me to loose my balance and drop my phone in the trash can ! i could not believe my eyes !

attributes.title: The worst decision of my life
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and had to delete it before I even got to open it because it crashed my phone, sent me hundreds of thousands of dollars in debt, and immediately altered all of my racists family members to call me with their congratulations... at least I now know who to block.
